name: The user authenticates with invalid credentials
scenarioId: auth:The user authenticates with invalid credentials
methodName: The user authenticates with invalid credentials

testSteps.description: Given the user is on the login page
When the user enters an invalid username and password

children.description: user executes a POST on the resource auth/login

testSteps.description: Then the system responds with a rejection code due to unauthorized access

children.description: Then response code should be Predicates.equalTo(401)

userStory.narrative:
As a user of the portal, I want to log in
  to perform actions that require authentication.
